thread.title: Recovery: Ranieri confirms why Jeffrey Schlupp missed training on Thursday
thread.title_full: Recovery: Ranieri confirms why Jeffrey Schlupp missed training on Thursday

title: Recovery: Ranieri confirms why Jeffrey Schlupp missed training on Thursday
text:
Sports News | 15 October 2015 22:40 CET Recovery: Ranieri confirms why Jeffrey Schlupp missed training on Thursday - www.allsports.com.gh 
Jeffrey Schlupp missed training for English Premier League club Leicester City on Thursday, his manager Claudio Ranieri. 
The Ghanaian defender and team-mate Riyad Mahrez were given the day off to recover after arriving on Thursday morning from their international duty. 
Jeffrey Schlupp was with the senior national team of Ghana, the Black Stars and player in the international friendly against Canada in Washington, United States of America. 
CR: 'Today we had a training session. @Mahrez22 and @Jeffrey_Schlupp didn't train because they arrived this morning and they must recover." â€” Leicester City (@LCFC) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0
